body.p:
Lebanon October 28th 1865
To his Excellency Thos E, Bramlette

Your petitioner would state that at a recent term of the magistrates court for the Raywick district in marion county he was fined the sum of seven dollars for contempt of court -- Your petitioner states that he was intoxicated at the time and ment no contempt of court and regrets the circumstance and is exceedingly sorry that he appeared in court in the condition in which he was -- Your petitioner respectfully requests your Excellency to remit the fine as he is very poor has to rent the land on which he lives and has a family to support --

John H ^his X mark^ Davis
attest J. R Thomas
The undersigned loyal citizens of Marion county Knowing the former good character of the petitioner for sobriety cordially join in the above petition

Nicholas, Miles
